the §6Vibrant Capacitor§r is §elast tier of §5EnderIO§e's Capacitor Bank§r. It has the functionality as the previous tier but offers a §elarger capacity§r that is §a25MRf§r.

You can craft it using a §6Vibrant Crystal§r, 4 §6Electrical Steel Ingot§rs, and 4 §6Octadic Capacitor§r. If you have 2 of the Standard §6Capacitor Bank§rs, you can also craft it with only a Vibrant Crystal, 4 §6Vibrant Alloy Ingot§rs, 2 Octadic Capacitors and those Standard Capacitor Banks.
